page.title: 05ISLAND SHOP
page.content: {Astley Cottage}is the only shop in the central area of the island. It is mainly a{general merchant}.Outside the shop are petrol pumps which are operated manually.The shop is open from eight in the morning till eight in the evening,Mondays to Saturdays.On Sundays it opens at one o clock and closes at five p.m.The goods come from Wilsons a wholesale store in Stromness.They arrive by cargo boat on Mondays and Thursdays.On Saturdays the goods are delivered by pasenger boat. Three people work in the shop on different days.They enjoy their work because there is always time for a chat to hear the news of the Island.On an average day they will have 30 {customers}.If you wish to advertise an Island event the shop notice board is the best place.
